item.title: 墨西哥 Elektra 公司股价下滑，抹去了前一天的涨幅
item.description: 墨西哥零售商埃莱克特拉集团（Grupo Elektra）的股价在周三下午的交易中下跌了近 11%，超过了前一天收复的失地。【原文：Shares in Mexican retailer Grupo Elektra sank by nearly 11% in afternoon trading on Wednesday, more than wiping out the ground recovered the day before.】

item.title: 美国法官裁定，塔吉特必须面对股东就骄傲反弹提起的诉讼
item.description: 塔吉特未能说服佛罗里达州的一名法官驳回指控该零售商欺骗股东的诉讼，因为它在骄傲月销售以 LGBTQ 为主题的商品引发了反弹和顾客抵制。【原文：Target has failed to persuade a judge in Florida to dismiss a lawsuit that accused the retailer of deceiving shareholders after its sales of LGBTQ-themed merchandise for Pride Month sparked a backlash and a customer boycott.】

item.title: Meta 将投资 100 亿美元建设路易斯安那州数据中心
item.description: Facebook 母公司 Meta 周三表示，计划投资 100 亿美元在路易斯安那州建立一个人工智能数据中心，这将是该科技公司在全球最大的数据中心。【原文：Facebook-parent Meta said on Wednesday it plans to invest $10 billion to set up an AI data center in Louisiana, in what would be the tech company's largest data center in the world.】

item.title: 新西兰恒天然集团报告第一季度利润下降
item.description: 恒天然合作社（Fonterra Co-operative）周四报告称，第一季度税后利润下降，主要是受到销量下降和牛奶价格上涨的影响。【原文：Fonterra Co-operative reported a drop in its first-quarter profit after tax on Thursday, flagging impacts from lower sales volume and higher milk prices.】

item.title: 美联储调查显示，最近几周美国经济略有增长
item.description: 美联储周三在一份统称为 "米色报告 "的全国调查和访谈摘要中表示，自10月初以来，美国大部分地区的经济活动略有扩张，就业增长 "低迷"，通胀率小幅上升，企业对未来表示乐观。【原文：U.S. economic activity has expanded slightly in most regions since early October, with employment growth "subdued" and inflation rising at a modest pace and businesses expressing optimism about the future, the Federal Reserve said on Wednesday in a summary of surveys and interviews from across the country known collectively as the "Beige Book."】

item.title: 国防公司 Anduril 与 OpenAI 合作，在国家安全任务中使用人工智能
item.description: 国防技术公司 Anduril Industries 和 ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 周三宣布建立合作伙伴关系，为国家安全任务开发和部署先进的人工智能解决方案。【原文：Defense technology company Anduril Industries and ChatGPT-maker OpenAI on Wednesday announced a partnership to develop and deploy advanced artificial intelligence solutions for national security missions.】

item.title: 由于投入成本上升，Chipotle 墨西哥烤肉店提高了菜单价格
item.description: 墨西哥卷饼连锁店 Chipotle Mexican Grill 周三表示，该公司已将菜单价格上调约 2%，以应对在美国餐饮业需求不稳定的环境下投入成本的增加。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill said on Wednesday it has raised menu prices by about 2%, as the burrito chain counters higher input costs in the midst of a choppy demand environment for restaurants in the United States.】

item.title: 花旗集团在八个国家为员工推出人工智能工具
item.description: 花旗集团高级管理人员表示，花旗集团周三开始推出新的人工智能工具，供八个国家的员工使用。【原文：Citigroup began rolling out on Wednesday new artificial intelligence tools to be used by employees in eight countries, senior executives said.】

item.title: 爱尔兰老激进分子将就电视剧《什么都别说》中的描述起诉迪士尼
item.description: 爱尔兰资深激进分子玛丽安-普赖斯（Marian Price）对沃尔特-迪斯尼（Walt Disney）提起了法律诉讼，因为她在 1972 年热播的美国流媒体剧集《什么也别说》中被描绘成杀害了珍-麦康维尔（Jean McConville）。【原文：Veteran Irish militant Marian Price has initiated legal proceedings against Walt Disney after she was depicted killing Jean McConville in 1972 in the hit U.S. streaming series "Say Nothing."】

item.title: 在耐克鞋需求疲软的情况下，Foot Locker 将在门店主推耐克新款鞋
item.description: Foot Locker 公司高管周三表示，他们正与耐克公司密切合作，在假日购物季来临之际，在对这家运动鞋巨头的产品需求 "疲软 "的情况下，强调其较新的款式，包括 Vomero 和 Air DT Max 鞋款。【原文：Foot Locker executives said on Wednesday they are working closely with Nike to emphasize its newer styles, including Vomero and Air DT Max shoe models, amid "softness" in demand for the sneaker giant's products as the holiday shopping season begins.】

item.title: Soitec 将为 GlobalFoundries 的 9SW 平台提供晶圆
item.description: Soitec将为GlobalFoundries（GF）的最新无线电平台提供RF-SOI晶圆。【原文：Soitec will supply GlobalFoundries (GF) with its RF-SOI wafers for GF's latest radio platform.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官告诉投资者，该行将在 3 月前改善 Banco BPM 的竞购方案
item.description: 据一位参加了虚拟会议的人士称，联合信贷银行首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 在周三的投资者电话会议上表示，联合信贷银行将在 3 月份之前评估改进其对 Banco BPM 的收购要约。【原文：UniCredit has until March to evaluate improving its takeover bid for Banco BPM , CEO Andrea Orcel told an investor call on Wednesday according to a person who attended the virtual meeting.】

item.title: 贝莱德投资研究所进一步 "增持 "美国股票
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所（BII）周三表示，随着人工智能在各行各业的广泛应用释放出买入机会，贝莱德已进一步 "增持 "美国股市，即使美国股市正处于历史高位。【原文：The BlackRock Investment Institute (BII) said on Wednesday that it had gone further "overweight" on U.S. equities as greater adoption of AI unlocks buying opportunities across sectors, even with U.S. stocks trading at record highs.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空中客车公司在国防与航天领域裁员2000多人
item.description: 两位熟知内情的人士透露，空中客车公司将在其国防与amp; 航天部门裁员2043人，而此前预计的裁员人数为2500人。【原文：Airbus is cutting 2,043 jobs in its Defence & Space division, compared with its earlier estimate of up to 2,500 job reductions, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 消息人士称，股票和货币推动欧洲对冲基金 11 月回报率上升
item.description: 路透社周三公布的业绩数据显示，由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和共和党在美国大选中获胜，市场大涨，全球股市和汇市帮助欧洲对冲基金在 11 月份取得了积极的业绩。【原文：Global stock and currency markets helped European hedge funds finish November with positive results, as markets surged on a U.S. election win for Donald Trump and the Republicans, performance numbers seen by Reuters on Wednesday showed.】

item.title: 新日铁承诺收购美国钢铁公司，目标是在 12 月完成收购，高管如是说
item.description: 日本新日铁公司（Nippon Steel）的一位高级管理人员表示，尽管包括当选总统唐纳德-特朗普在内的美国方面强烈反对，该公司仍致力于以 150 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel），并有信心在年底前完成收购。【原文：Japan's Nippon Steel is committed to its $15 billion acquisition of U.S. Steel and is confident of completing it by year-end, a senior executive said, despite strong U.S. opposition including from President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 特朗普的加密货币主张引导企业远离传统国库资产
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）支持加密货币的立场正促使小型企业将部分现金配置到比特币上，这对传统资产的主导地位构成了挑战，因为企业正在寻求更稳健的通胀对冲手段。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's pro-crypto stance is prompting small businesses to allocate portions of their cash to bitcoin, challenging the dominance of traditional assets as companies look for more robust inflation hedges.】

item.title: 加航将对基本票价乘客收取随身行李费
item.description: 加拿大航空公司（Air Canada）周三表示，将从 1 月 3 日起对选择北美航线最低基本票价的乘客收取更大随身行李的费用。【原文：Air Canada said on Wednesday it will start charging for bigger carry-on bags from passengers opting for its lowest-priced basic fare for North America routes starting Jan. 3.】

item.title: 施耐德电气与 Nvidia 合作设计数据中心冷却系统
item.description: 法国电气设备制造商施耐德电气公司（Schneider Electric）周三表示，该公司正与英伟达（Nvidia）合作开发数据中心冷却系统设计，以用于新的人工智能数据中心。【原文：French electrical equipment maker Schneider Electric is working with Nvidia to develop designs for data center cooling systems for use in new artificial intelligence data centers, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 关注鲍威尔讲话，寻找美联储降息的反弹或支持迹象
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔将于周三发表讲话，周五将公布关键的就业数据，在周六开始的 12 月 17-18 日会议之前，美联储官员将迎来一段 "平静期"，投资者将倾向于在两周后的央行会议上连续第三次降息的预期。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell speaks on Wednesday with key jobs data due Friday, a "quiet" period for Fed officials ahead of the Dec. 17-18 meeting beginning on Saturday, and investors leaning into an expectation for a third straight interest rate cut when the central bank meets in two weeks.】

item.title: 美国财政部称，与俄罗斯有关的制裁针对非法数字金融网络
item.description: 拜登政府周三发布了新一轮与俄罗斯有关的制裁措施，矛头直指所谓的非法金融网络，该网络允许俄罗斯精英利用数字资产规避制裁。【原文：The Biden administration issued a fresh round of Russia-related sanctions on Wednesday, taking aim at what it called an illicit finance network that allowed Russian elites to leverage digital assets to avoid sanctions.】

item.title: 独家报道壳牌放缓海上风电投资，分拆电力业务
item.description: 壳牌公司告诉路透社，在首席执行官瓦埃勒-萨万（Wael Sawan）努力提高利润的推动下，壳牌对其业务进行了广泛的审查，在此之后，壳牌将退出新的海上风电投资，并将拆分其电力部门。【原文：Shell is stepping back from new offshore wind investments and is splitting its power division following an extensive review of the business under CEO Wael Sawan's drive to boost profits, the company told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国 10 月份工厂订单小幅增长
item.description: 10 月份，美国制成品的新订单略有反弹，而企业的设备支出在第四季度初似乎有所放缓。【原文：New orders for U.S.-manufactured goods rebounded marginally in October while business spending on equipment appeared to have softened early in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，苹果公司在中国改造百度人工智能模型面临障碍
item.description: 据 The Information 周三报道，苹果公司和百度正在努力为在中国销售的 iPhone 添加人工智能功能，但面临的障碍可能会损害这家科技巨头在中国的手机销售。【原文：Apple and Baidu are working to add AI features to iPhones sold in China, but are facing hurdles that could hurt the tech giant's phone sales in the country, The Information reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国服务业活动在 11 月份得到喘息
item.description: 美国服务业活动在近几个月大幅增长后，11 月份有所放缓，但仍高于第四季度经济稳健增长的水平。【原文：U.S. services sector activity slowed in November after posting big gains in recent months, but remained above levels consistent with solid economic growth in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 加拿大 11 月服务业采购经理人指数升至 19 个月新高
item.description: S&P全球公司周三公布的加拿大服务业采购经理人指数（PMI）数据显示，由于企业增加了员工，加拿大服务业经济在11月份连续第二个月实现扩张，但新增工作受到抑制，而且美国关税的威胁可能会损害市场情绪。【原文：Canada's services economy expanded for a second straight month in November as firms added staff, but incoming new work was subdued and the threat of U.S. tariffs could yet hurt sentiment, S&P Global's Canada services PMI data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 道达尔能源以 16.5 亿美元收购德国可再生能源开发商 VSB
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）周三表示，已同意以 15.7 亿欧元（16.5 亿美元）的价格从瑞士资产管理公司 Partners Group 收购德国可再生能源开发商 VSB 集团。【原文：French oil major TotalEnergies has agreed to purchase German renewable developer VSB Group for 1.57 billion euros ($1.65 billion) from Swiss asset manager Partners Group, it said Wednesday.】

item.title: 报道称，联合健康保险公司高管在曼哈顿遭枪击身亡
item.description: 据多家媒体援引警方官员的话报道，联合健康保险部门首席执行官布莱恩-汤普森（Brian Thompson）周三上午在曼哈顿中城希尔顿酒店外胸部中弹身亡。【原文：Brian Thompson, the CEO of UnitedHealth's insurance unit, was fatally shot in the chest on Wednesday morning outside the Hilton hotel in midtown Manhattan, several media outlets reported, citing police officials.】

item.title: 首席财务官称，Stellantis 董事会与 Tavares 在短期优先事项和对外关系上存在分歧
item.description: 财务总监道格-奥斯特曼（Doug Ostermann）周三表示，卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯与斯泰兰特董事会成员之间的分歧导致了首席执行官的突然辞职，分歧主要集中在未来15个月的工作重点以及汽车制造商与利益相关者的关系上。【原文：Divergences between Carlos Tavares and Stellantis board members, which led to the CEO's abrupt resignation, were mainly over priorities for the next 15 months and on how the automaker relates to its stakeholders, finance chief Doug Ostermann said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨勒姆预计将进一步降息，但称宽松路径不太清晰
item.description: 圣路易斯联储主席阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆周三表示，他预计美国央行将能够继续降息，但他警告说，未来行动的步伐已经越来越不明确。【原文：St. Louis Federal Reserve President Alberto Musalem said on Wednesday he expects the U.S. central bank will be able to continue to cut interest rates but warned the pace of future actions has grown less clear.】
